Roma welcome last season’s Coppa Italia champions Bologna to the Stadio Olimpico for their Serie A opener. Roma are raring to start the new season after experiencing a major rejuvenation…

The new Serie A campaign gets underway on Saturday, as the league returns following an incredible finish to last season, and Aaron Rogan has predictions for all 10 games.

Napoli begin their title defence without the injured Romelu Lukaku, who might not return in 2025. They play newly-promoted Sassuolo. Meanwhile, Milan take on Cremonese and Roma face Bologna.

arts.ttl: Roma vs. Bologna: a big clash
arts.sum: Roma are top of the table in the second half of the 2024/25 Serie A Enilive season, with 46 points thanks to 14 wins, 4 draws, and just 1 defeat in 19 games. The season kicks off with a bang at the Olimpico, as Roma host Bologna in what could already be a six-pointer in the race for the top four.

arts.ttl: AS Roma vs Bologna – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma begin their Serie A campaign with a home fixture against Bologna at the Stadio Olimpico on Saturday. The Giallorossi welcome the Rossoblu to Rome for their opening match of the 2025/26 season under new manager Gian Piero Gasperini.
